nodes.text: Nalrin Daheel was a male Ugnaught Senator who represented Gentes in the Galactic Senate of the Republic during the Cold War against the resurgent Sith Empire.

An elderly Ugnaught statesman, Nalrin Daheel represented the Ugnaught peoples' interest in the Galactic Republic Senate circa 3643 BBY following the Great Galactic War and the resurgence of the resurgent Sith Empire. Part of the Cold War-era Senate, Daheel played politics with his colleagues in an attempt to get justice for his people. While attempting to appear friendly with Senator Gunaray Dod, Daheel secretly detested the Neimoidian, believing him to be in league with the criminal organization Black Sun, but lacking any proof. Daheel hoped to trace Dod's dealings with the criminals through obtaining rare Neimoidian currency called Kavin to implicate Senator Dod.

Nalrin Daheel appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic. Daheel gives the mission "Follow the Money", where he asks the player to recover 8 stacks of Kavin bills from Black Sun thugs so that he can prove Dod's corruption.
